title: At Elon Musk’s ‘brittle’ Twitter, small tweaks trigger massive outages
description: “Every mistake in code and operations is now deadly” a former engineer said last year. That dire prediction appears to be coming true.

title: Retouch and go: These tools help erase distractions in your photos
description: Birds, power lines, photobombers — lots of things can muck up a nice picture. Thankfully, tools that rely on machine learning may help, no expertise needed.
